ygData.subject: RE: Questions about FEAR PLANE....
ygData.msgSnippet: nice, i will have to relay the info on the phoboplasms.  myself and another bard have greaves.  we have yet to see the bracer and BP.  i got a helm today (hehe
ygData.messageBody:
nice, i will have to relay the info on the phoboplasms. myself and another
bard have greaves. we have yet to see the bracer and BP. i got a helm
today (hehe wife at home playing) which is basically worthless unless in DE
form i guess.

our groups did know that the entire zone needs to be cleared before taking
on cazic, but damn good job getting him with his 3 goons around. too bad he
dropped nothing, he usually has something good.

Shada

>
> Well last night was spectularly fun because we didnt have a
> single zone
> crash. This enabled us to clear almost everything in the zone
> except for
> Cazic himself and his three henchmen fright, terror, and dread. We had
> killed all of his henchmen before and they hadnt dropped anything
> interesting so we where thinking we would just rather ignore
> them. At this
> point we started getting cocky. Dracoliche was cake for us
> and if another
> server could kill cazic, well then we could to. So we
> launched our assault
> and imediatly cazic said something about his henchmen better
> come over and
> help him. At this point various profanties where uttered as
> we realized our
> fatal mistake, and sure enough fright, terror, and dread
> showed up on the
> spot just as we had cazic at half life. Luckily for us we had
> several high
> level magicancs and necros which set their pets on the
> henchmen. With this
> borrowed time we finished cazic and gated out with minimal
> losses. Killing
> him was about the same as the dracoliche except the three henchman.
> Definatly need to take out the henchmen first before killing cazic :)
>
> Updated bestiary:
> Phoboplasms are my new personal favorite, they can drop up to
> TWO random
> class specific items. Last night we killed around 8 of these
> guys and TWO
> dropped a bard bracer, along with a bunch of ranger and shaman stuff.
> Cazic Thule : 8 platinum. Thats it. Good thing killing him
> was so much fun
> cause that was a big let down.
> Nightmare's drop some silly piece of nightmare hide that can cancel
> blindness. Woopydo.
>
>
> Total bard pieces found have been 2 bracers, helmet, and
> boots (which i
> got) and arms and gloves which another bard got. No greaves
> or breastplates
> yet :(
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
